text: Nia gowaa dogi mee la gaa hai di anggowaa, gaa gahu go nia ‘sulphur’ mono toolo, hagalee nia mee e dogi ai, nia geinga hogi hagalee tomo i golo. Godou gowaa la gaa hai be nia waahale Sodom mo Gomorrah, mo Admah mo Zeboiim, ala ne oho go Dimaadua, i dono madagoaa nogo hagawelewele huoloo.29.23 Genesis 19.24-25
